trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewRowCollection contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O DataGridViewRowCollection contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>objetos num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an instance of this class through the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode obter uma instância desta classe através do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection maintains a reference to the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A coleção mantém uma referência para o controlo através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection.DataGridView%2A>

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, a DataGridViewRowCollection includes shared and unshared rows.
trans-unit.target: Para melhorar o desempenho, uma DataGridViewRowCollection inclui partilhadas e sem linhas.

trans-unit.source: Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set.
trans-unit.target: Linhas partilhadas partilham memória para reduzir o custo de um grande conjunto de registos.

trans-unit.source: If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: Se o conjunto de registos é muito grande, deve ter cuidado manter as linhas partilhadas quanto possível.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
